name: Enjoy Hanoi on the nice weekend with me.
description:
Enjoy Hanoi with me. There is no better way than travel with locals. Moreover, I have big passion about food :)I also see many foreigners missed a lot of charming food in Hanoi and for me, it's a pity. I will give you guys true experiences and leave Hanoi with memory.
I will pick you guys in the morning in your hotel and then starting a tour :)
